treatment.description: Differing from no. 175 in its lesser stature (up to 2 m. or more) and more slender canes; branches of canes long-arching nearly to ground; racemes with many foliaceous bracts; calyx-lobes promptly and strongly reflexed; fruit ellipsoid, distinctly longer than thick, 2-3 cm. long.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Thickets and borders of woods, sw. Que. to Mich., s. to Vt., N.Y. and nw. N.J.; cult. and locally spread elsewhere.
